title: BigFish Games - Mystery Stories - Berlin Nights FINAL - New Hidd
description:
Mystery Stories - Berlin Nights

The sequel to cerasus.media&#039;s hidden object adventure Mystery Stories: 

Island of Hope will take place in the European metropolis of Berlin. As 

part of Casual Connect, the developer has given us the early scoop on 

Mystery Stories: Berlin Nights.

New York journalist Michelle Deanfield is in Berlin when she finds out 

that somewhere inside the complex underground system of bunkers and 

tunnels, archaeologists have made a spectacular discovery: an 

unfinished machine from World War II, whose completion was prevented by 

the Nazis, that has the potential to solve the world&#039;s energy crisis.

You&#039;ll get to help Michelle search 20 of Berlin&#039;s most famous locations 

for clues and pieces of the machine with the help of handsome German 

engineer Daniel Ritter.

But Michelle isn&#039;t the only one searching for the machine; a mysterious 

sect and some ruthless ex-secret agents from former communist East 

Germany also want to get their hands on it.

The game offers 95 levels and both an Adventure and Free Puzzle mode, 

as well as un-timed Relax mode.


Thanx to TAC-CM
